title: An action against Scripters
body:
I'm here straight to the point, Riot please investigate a player named _Name Removed_, i am under the suspicion that he is using third party illegal programs to modify and mess around with on league causing a community set back as well as breaching the terms and laws of agreement. 
I have no idea how i can share the replay but i have downloaded it on the client.

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

I've edited the name out of your post because it goes against our ["No Naming and Shaming"](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) rule. 

The boards is also a pretty ineffective place to report, only a few Rioters are on here with any frequency and they rarely look into reports. You're much better off sending in a Riot Support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Only send in a ticket though if you have reason to believe that he won't be caught by the normal scripting detection system.

(BTW you can share a replay by hitting the little red record button at the bottom)
